text: Madinabasi o tadera parsbabarti marubasidera jan'ya sangata naya ye tara allahâ€Œra rasulera sahagami na haye pichane raye yabe ebam tara jibanera ceye nijedera jibanake priya mane karabe; karana allahara pathe taderake ye trsna, klanti o ksuda peye base ebam kapheradera krodha udreka kare tadera emana pratiti padaksepa ara satruderake kono kasta pradana kare [1], ta tadera jan'ya satkajarupe lipibad'dha kara haya.
